hi all, first of all this is a fantastic project, congrats all !

 

im building an aplication for my bussiness and i need to print an excel file right after filling a form, i know how to write and read from file, but how can i send that file to printer ?

i hope someone can help me with this. thanks alote !
Are you talking about a printer on the client (browser user's) machine? or on the web server?
